name: A Slime's Reincarnation
description:
Movement :

A- left

D - right

W/Spacebar - jump

Story :

This slime was recently killed by an adventurer, within this purgatory a giant wall attempts to clear out those stuck to send them into the afterlife, but maybe returning home through the portal and "respawning" is worth it. 

Side Note :

This is my 2nd Game Jam ever, I didn't end up completing it in time nor achieved what I wanted to do with the game. Overall, it was a fun experience and I learned a lot about Unity from this. Might revisit this project one day who knows.
